summary: The diff shows modifications to UserListTable.tsx implementing mobile-responsive card layout with stacked information and proper styling. The implementation addresses both REQ-161 (mobile-responsive stacked layout) and REQ-162 (styling with dark theme and touch targets). Evidence shows hidden md:block for desktop table view and mobile card rendering with proper structure, though the diff is truncated.

hallucinated_features.description: Desktop table displays Principal ID column instead of Username and WhatsApp Number
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest specifies that desktop table should show Username, WhatsApp Number, and Status badge. The diff shows desktop table has Principal ID, Status, and Action columns instead. The constraints explicitly state 'Do not change the desktop table layout or existing UserListTable functionality', but the evidence shows the desktop table structure was modified.

hallucinated_features.description: Sorting functionality added to prioritize pending approvals
hallucinated_features.reason: The diff shows sortedApprovals logic that orders users by status (pending first, then approved, then rejected). This sorting feature was not requested in either REQ-161 or REQ-162.
